channel.title: Comments on: Voice Recognition / Speech Recognition and speech for the iPhone
channel.description: iOS Frameworks for speech recognition, text to speech and more

item.title: By: Halle
item.dc:creator: Halle
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2010/09/08/voicerecognition-for-the-iphone/#comment-305">Brian King</a>.
Hey Brian,
Cool to hear from you, VocalKit is great. If you ever get a chance to try OpenEars out I'd love to get your feedback.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Brian King.

Hey Brian,

Cool to hear from you, VocalKit is great. If you ever get a chance to try OpenEars out I’d love to get your feedback.

item.title: By: Brian King
item.dc:creator: Brian King
item.description:
Hey Halle, The Library looks great. I'm the author of VocalKit which is a quick wrapper around pocket sphinx, but it was mostly a slight cleanup of a spike I did and never had much of a reason to work more on it. A lot of people are using it and I'm going to start pointing them in your direction. I don't have much time to work on it and your project looks great.
Brian King
item.content:encoded:
Hey Halle,
The Library looks great. I’m the author of VocalKit which is a quick wrapper around pocket sphinx, but it was mostly a slight cleanup of a spike I did and never had much of a reason to work more on it. A lot of people are using it and I’m going to start pointing them in your direction. I don’t have much time to work on it and your project looks great.

Brian King

item.title: By: Halle
item.dc:creator: Halle
item.description:
Hi Jake,
Thanks! Let me know how it works for you.
I think it might not be too big of a deal to get OpenEars working with Spanish, with the caveat that I haven't attempted any acoustic model implementations for other languages. If you'd like to move the conversation over to the forums at /forums we can take a look at what is involved in that.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Jake,

Thanks! Let me know how it works for you.

I think it might not be too big of a deal to get OpenEars working with Spanish, with the caveat that I haven’t attempted any acoustic model implementations for other languages. If you’d like to move the conversation over to the forums at /forums we can take a look at what is involved in that.

item.title: By: Jake
item.dc:creator: Jake
item.description: Halle - this is awesome. Plan to start working with this over the next couple of weeks. Does it work with other languages besides English? Would it be a major undertaking for me to extend it to spanish? thanks!
item.content:encoded: Halle – this is awesome. Plan to start working with this over the next couple of weeks. Does it work with other languages besides English? Would it be a major undertaking for me to extend it to spanish? thanks!
